title: Bike Check: Lael Wilcox’s Around-the-World Specialized Roubaix
content:
Wilcox set off on May 26 in her attempt to set a new Guinness World Record for fastest circumnavigation of the globe by bicycle.

Read the full article at Bike Check: Lael Wilcox’s Around-the-World Specialized Roubaix on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
